rule:
Each individual sentence in the paragraph must be wrapped with a

tag.
input: Rain refreshes the earth. The sky clears up. Rainbows appear.
complianceText:
The output contains six

tags, which exceed the minimum requirement of three

tags; hence it complies with that part of the description. Each

tag contains a tag and multiple tags, which also complies with the requirement to emphasize key words and phrases inside each

tag. There are no explicit violations of the guidelines given the information provided. Since no checks which require knowing the input are needed, this output complies entirely with the description. No violation. OK
